gpt_scene_description_list: On a city road, the weather is clear, and the traffic flow is light.
Ahead on the right, there is a dark-colored car (car_1) driving and about to pass the crosswalk.
On the left side of the vehicle, there is a pedestrian (person_1) standing by the roadside, possibly waiting to cross the street.
On the right side of the road are buildings and plants, and on the left side, there is a public parking lot building.
There are guardrails on both sides of the road to protect pedestrians from walking on the road.
The traffic sign ahead indicates a safety reminder for pedestrians crossing the street.
There is also a stop sign ahead, reminding vehicles to stop before proceeding.
The crosswalk markings are very clear, ensuring pedestrian safety.
